channel.title: Daily Mass

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Praying As A Family
channel.desc: Families reflect on the difficulty of the unexpected death of a loved one, especially a child, and the mystery of suffering. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch and Msgr. Charles Pope discuss the fear of the Lord and the growing trend of rejecting the doctrine of Hell, and why some either believe Hell doesn?t exist, or is empty. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Through My Lens With Fr. Lawrence Lew
channel.desc: Follow Fr. Lawrence Lew OP, as he explores various places of religious significance around the world and shares his reflections and insights during this stunning visual pilgrimage. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life On The Rock
channel.desc: Fr. Mark and Jason Simon, president of Evangelical Catholic, discuss the importance of faith and friendship, noting how friendship calls us to help each other overcome struggles. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer and Doug discuss how the way mud in the area dried up and people as far as 10 miles away viewed the event, disproves the miracle of the sun mass hallucination theory. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sri Lanka : J?sus, Sauve Le Sri Lanka !
channel.desc: Le 21 avril 2019 ? le dimanche de P?ques ? vers 08h45, une s?rie d'attentats ? la bombe a frapp? Colombo, la capitale du Sri Lanka, en commen?ant avec une explosion ? l'?glise catholique de Saint-Antoine, qui a le statut de sanctuaire national. Moins de 45 minutes plus tard, une autre bombe a explos? ? l'?glise catholique Saint-S?bastien de Negomba, tandis qu?une troisi?me explosion s?est produite ? l'?glise protestante de Sion ? Batticaloa. Au m?me moment, des explosions se sont produites dans trois h?tels de Colombo pris?s par les touristes occidentaux. Le bilan d?finitif est de 264 morts et plus de 500 bless?s. L'?tat islamique a revendiqu? les attentats, mais le gouvernement a accus? un groupe extr?miste islamiste local, le National Thawheed Jamaath (NTJ), d'?tre responsable des attentats. Apr?s pr?s d'un an, 300 personnes ont ?t? arr?t?es et certaines des ?glises ont ?t? r?par?es, reconsacr?es et rouvertes. Aujourd'hui, plus d'un an plus tard, les Srilankais ont toujours peur tout en continuant ? soigner leurs blessures physiques et psychologiques. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Donald Calloway discusses the Feast of Corpus Christi and why a resurgence of belief in the Real Presence in the Eucharist is needed. Sr. Briege McKenna shares her story. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: They Might Be Saints Sister Marie De Mandat Grancey
channel.desc: The fascinating story of Sister Marie de Mandat-Grancey. Follow her extraordinary efforts to locate the house of Mary, the Mother of Jesus, as she travels to Ephesus, Turkey to bring this treasure to the Catholic Church. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers questions about the ability to lose one?s salvation, the meaning behind Jesus dying for our sins, why fish may be eaten on fasting days, and transubstantiation. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Priesthood Of Jesus Christ
channel.desc: Fr. Miller continues his examination of ancient Christian writings to further our knowledge of the priesthood in near-apostolic times. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother says that she has a difficult time having a father figure because her father was not around. Those who were abused and have a hard time thinking of God as Father. We should never be afraid of the Father. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Sr. Mary Juliana knows well the unique challenges educators face in today?s culture. She shares how Catholic educators meet those challenges and strive for student excellence. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Every week, Abigail Galv?n and a team of pro-life experts shine the light of truth on abortion, euthanasia, assisted suicide, and the culture of death. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Joanna visits Kingston, where the very first kings of England were crowned and on to the shrine of Our Lady of Westminster where the old statue has been given a new home and welcomes pilgrims from along the Thames. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: In Concert: Catholic Choral Masterpieces
channel.desc: Filmed on location at the Music and Beyond festival in Ottawa, Canada, the Theatre of Early Music performs Pergolesi?s Stabat Mater, the Concerto #2 for Oboe in D minor by Albinoni and Two Love Duets by Handel. (60 minutes).
